title: Always watching football here
text: We love to watch football here expecially the premier league. There are almost 10 televisions in the house so you can enjoy the variety of sports. The food is delicious. I love Kapao Moo Sup with Khai Dao.
place: The Sport Corner - Sports Bar and Grill

title: Good Atmosphere
text:
Good place to chit chat with friends.
The Staff khun Ning is taking a good care of us. Variety of food and beer.

title: Once in your life time
text: You have to see this place by yourself. It's amazing. But it's a tourist spot so of course there are many people on the line up there so just be chilled get in line. The floor is quite slippery. Be careful.

title: 3 nights stay
text: The staffs are friendly and helpful with the smiles. This hotel has the swimming pool in the roof top also bar and restaurant and you can see the Acropolis from there. The room on 1st floor quite small but enough.

title: Perfect
text: I love munnork island. This is a perfect vacation. Clear sea and nice beach, best place to relax and not too far from Bangkok. Food was great especially the fresh coconut juice. The little hut by tge beach is so fantastic we can lay down there all day to see the perfect view. The view above and under the sea is too good to be true. Thank you all the staffs there for taking a good care:)
place: Koh Munnork Private Island Resort by Epikurean Lifestyle
